channel.title: Artifax Radio Crypto & Grid News
channel.description: Artifax Crypto & Grid news provides you up to date news in crypto and 3d virtual grids.

item.title: Introducing a New Second Life Mini-Series - “Love Made in SL”
item.author: Piloth
item.description: Just in time for Valentines’ Day! Second Life is proud to announce the debut of “Love Made in SL,” a new limited-run mini-series showcasing the many real stories of romance in the virtual lives of the Second Life community.

item.title: Bitcoin 3rd FALLING WEDGE?! | BREAKING: Samsung Galaxy S10 With Integrated CRYPTO Wallet!!
item.author: Piloth

item.title: Bitmain Announces New, More Efficient 7nm Bitcoin Mining Chip (Clearnet)
item.author: Piloth
item.description: Bitmain Technologies has announced a new 7nm bitcoin mining processor that it says offers a big boost in energy efficiency.

item.title: Japanese “Amazon” Rakuten May Soon Accept Cryptocurrency (Clearnet)
item.author: Piloth
item.description: Bitcoin (BTC), Cryptocurrency–A new update pushed by e-commerce giant Rakuten, who has been compared to as the Japanese “Amazon,” looks to offer Bitcoin and cryptocurrency integration in the near future. According to an earnings report...

item.title: LIFE2 in Second Life Melts down
item.author: Piloth
item.description: The originator of the game, Hanley Spiser, has left the game due to a total server crash causing the loss of the entire game.
